Summary: 6-8 blue lights in straight line, moving very erraticly, not set patttern or direction.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There was one other sighting in Phoenix on or around May 26th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were on motorcycles heading south on I-17, between Cactus & Peoria when we spotted in the sky 8 blue lights, all in a row, not on a set course but but moving in different directions. It as a flowing motion, but yet the direction was very erratic.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
